subject: Relationships
subcategory: Famous Love Stories That Changed History
title: Barack and Michelle Obama
description: A quick win: understand Barack and Michelle Obama.

hook.text: She was his mentor at the law firm. He asked her out repeatedly. She finally said yes. They changed American history.

buildup.text: Michelle Robinson was assigned to mentor Barack Obama at their Chicago law firm in 1989. She resisted dating him.

discovery.text: Their first date included a community meeting, ice cream, and a showing of Spike Lee's 'Do the Right Thing.'

twist.text: Michelle sacrificed her own career ambitions for Barack's political rise â€” a tension she's spoken about openly.

climax.text: From a law firm assignment to the White House, their partnership shows that great love stories can reshape nations.

punchline.text: A law firm mentorship became a love story that reached the White House.

quiz.question: How did Barack and Michelle Obama meet?
options: She was his mentor at a law firm
